cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1)

add_subdirectory(${AUTO_ROOT_PATH}/AutoEngine/ThirdParty/glad)
add_subdirectory(${AUTO_ROOT_PATH}/AutoEngine/ThirdParty/glm)
add_subdirectory(${AUTO_ROOT_PATH}/AutoEngine/ThirdParty/KhSTL)
add_subdirectory(${AUTO_ROOT_PATH}/AutoEngine/ThirdParty/LZ4)
add_subdirectory(${AUTO_ROOT_PATH}/AutoEngine/ThirdParty/OpenAL)
add_subdirectory(${AUTO_ROOT_PATH}/AutoEngine/ThirdParty/SDL2)
add_subdirectory(${AUTO_ROOT_PATH}/AutoEngine/ThirdParty/STB)
